Desc.entry: Offers one-to-one support, counselling and advice on maximising overall health. Healthy meal plans cater for the needs of everyone, including BME communities. Runs seminars and workshops in care homes, schools and community centres, 6 or 12 week weight loss programmes in one-to-one sessions with essential monitoring and evaluation.

DisabledAccess.entry: Infra red hearing system, Voice synthesiser/visual display in lift, Braille plan of building
